splash.ready_description: All game settings are configured. Let's start the music!

ui.title: Soundbeats Party Game
ui.description: The ultimate Home Assistant party game experience!
ui.qr_modal_description: Scan this QR code with your mobile device to access Home Assistant from your phone.

settings.teams_description: How many teams will participate in the game?
settings.audio_player_description: Select where music should play from
settings.team_admin_notice: The user assigned to Team 1 will have admin privileges to manage game settings and teams.
settings.select_teams_first: Please select the number of teams above to set up team assignments
settings.choose_teams_first: Choose how many teams will play first
settings.countdown_description: How long teams have to guess (5-300 seconds)
settings.select_teams_for_assignments: Please select the number of teams in Game Settings first
settings.select_teams_for_assignments_full: Please select the number of teams in Game Settings first to set up team assignments
settings.missing_team_users_description: Assign a user to every team ({missing} of {total} teams still need users assigned).
settings.missing_team_count_description: Select how many teams will participate in the game (1-5 teams).
settings.missing_audio_player_description: Select a media player to play music during the game. This is where songs will be played from.
settings.missing_countdown_timer_description: Set a countdown timer length (5-300 seconds) for how long teams have to guess each song.

alerts.no_audio_player_message: Please select an audio player in the admin settings before starting the next song.
alerts.all_songs_played_message: All available songs have been played. Start a new game to reset the playlist.

game.year_guess_label: Guess the year this song was published:
game.within_years_correct: You were within {difference} year{plural} of the correct answer.
game.within_years_correct_exact: You were within {difference} years of the correct answer.

diagnostics.verify_integration: Verify the Soundbeats integration is properly installed
diagnostics.check_sensor: Check that the integration has created the highscore sensor
diagnostics.restart_ha: Restart Home Assistant if the sensor was recently added
